AD_WatchingPainPriest.synopsis: The goblins are watching Abdirak flaggelating himself in service of Loviatar and are disappointed with his methods of inflicting pain.

AD_DoPenance.synopsis: Spike orders Grush to go to the pain priest to undergo penance/torture.

AD_DrowDebrief.synopsis: The torturers have found out where the grove is and are reporting to the Drow.

Torture_AD.synopsis: Conversation between two goblins (Spike and Grush) torturing a captured adventurer (Liam).

MoveOut_AD.synopsis: AD played when the torturers leave the torture scene.

AD_WatchingPainPriest_0.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_WatchingPainPriest_0.text: What's he doin'? It's just the same thing over an' over.
AD_WatchingPainPriest_0.context: NodeContext: mumbled to the goblin standing next to him.

AD_WatchingPainPriest_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_WatchingPainPriest_1.text: C'mon! You can do better than that!
AD_WatchingPainPriest_1.context: NodeContext: shouted at the priest standing at the other side of the (small) room. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.

AD_WatchingPainPriest_2.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_WatchingPainPriest_2.text: You got candles all 'round ya! Use 'em!
AD_WatchingPainPriest_2.context: NodeContext: shouted at the priest standing at the other side of the (small) room. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.

AD_WatchingPainPriest_3.speaker: Lookout Grush
AD_WatchingPainPriest_3.text: Oh yes! Everyone howls when they're on fire!
AD_WatchingPainPriest_3.context: NodeContext: excited at the prospect of seeing someone set himself on fire.

AD_WatchingPainPriest_4.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_WatchingPainPriest_4.text: Didn't he call himself a master? Would've thought he'd be more creative.
AD_WatchingPainPriest_4.context: NodeContext: mumbled to the goblin standing next to him. He's disappointed that the priest is not hurting himself in more creative ways.

AD_DoPenance_0.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DoPenance_0.text: What's he doin'? Doesn't he need someone to torture?
AD_DoPenance_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player's penance was completed before Spike and Goblet came to the priest's roomNodeContext: puzzled, he doesn't understand the pain priest.

AD_DoPenance_3.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DoPenance_3.context: NodeContext: commanding, looking forward to seeing the other goblin get beat up.

AD_DoPenance_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DoPenance_1.text: Grush, I need to see that again. Ask him if you can do the penance thing too.
AD_DoPenance_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Spike and Goblet were there during the player's penanceNodeContext: interested, an idea is forming in his head.

AD_DoPenance_2.speaker: Lookout Grush
AD_DoPenance_2.context: NodeContext: unsure - he doesn't really want to disobey Spike, but he's going to get hurt.

AD_DoPenance_4.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DoPenance_4.text: Get in there! We might learn somethin'.
AD_DoPenance_4.context: NodeContext: commanding and excited - he won't allow Grush to talk back to him, and he's looking forward to seeing the other goblin get beat up.

AD_DrowDebrief_3.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DrowDebrief_3.text: We did it, Miss True Soul! We know where those nigglin' thieves are!
AD_DrowDebrief_3.context: NodeContext: He's proud. He succeeded a diffucult task and is reporting to his superior.

AD_DrowDebrief_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowDebrief_0.context: NodeContext: She's exhasperated, but happy someone finally did something good.

AD_DrowDebrief_5.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DrowDebrief_5.text: They got a grove to the east. Past the ruins and over the bridge.
AD_DrowDebrief_5.context: NodeContext: Still excited about his discovery, but becoming a bit more business-like.

AD_DrowDebrief_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
AD_DrowDebrief_1.text: They hid their gate with ivy.

AD_DrowDebrief_4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowDebrief_4.context: NodeContext: She's plewased, but also cold and looking forward to killing the adventurers.

AD_DrowDebrief_2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowDebrief_2.text: Get ready. We'll leave before they can flee.

Torture_AD_3.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_3.text: C'mon, you know what I want.

Torture_AD_11.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_11.context: NodeContext: He's standing right in front of the prisoner. He's not really shouting on top of his lungs, but he is very angry and loud.

Torture_AD_0.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_0.text: I'll set my rats on ya. My cute, little girls.

Torture_AD_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_1.text: They'll eat through yer belly button...
Torture_AD_1.context: NodeContext: He's describing how he's going to torture the adventurer.

Torture_AD_4.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_4.text: ... right down to your guts. Munch, munch!
Torture_AD_4.context: NodeContext: He's describing how he's going to torture the adventurer.

Torture_AD_13.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_13.text: An' don't worry 'bout passin' out - I'll make sure ya stay awake.
Torture_AD_13.context: NodeContext: He's describing how he's going to torture the adventurer.

Torture_AD_12.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_12.context: NodeContext: He's standing right in front of the prisoner. He's not really shouting on top of his lungs, but he is very angry and loud.

Torture_AD_9.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_9.text: Tell me where yer hideout is. Ain't so 'ard, is it?

Torture_AD_10.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_10.context: NodeContext: He's standing right in front of the prisoner. He's not really shouting on top of his lungs, but he is very angry and loud.

Torture_AD_7.speaker: Lookout Grush
Torture_AD_7.text: Can I rip off 'is ears? Tear out his eyes?

Torture_AD_8.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_8.text: Later. I gotta take it slow.

Torture_AD_2.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture_AD_2.context: NodeContext: He's standing right in front of the prisoner. He's not really shouting on top of his lungs, but he is very angry and loud.

MoveOut_AD_0.speaker: Torturer Spike
MoveOut_AD_0.text: C'mon. I wanna watch that weird priest next door.
MoveOut_AD_0.context: NodeContext: Looking forwards to watching this really strange priest who just arrived (the priest hurts himself and derives pleasure from it)

MoveOut_AD_5.speaker: Torturer Spike
MoveOut_AD_5.text: Sounded like he was beatin' somethin' up. Yeh, beatin' it good.
MoveOut_AD_5.context: NodeContext: Lean into the double entendre. The person he's talking about hurts himself and derives pleasure from it

MoveOut_AD_4.speaker: Torturer Spike
MoveOut_AD_4.context: NodeContext: Looking forward to getting a reward.

MoveOut_AD_2.speaker: Torturer Spike
MoveOut_AD_2.text: C'mon. I bet we'll even get some of the spoils.

MoveOut_AD_3.speaker: Lookout Grush
MoveOut_AD_3.context: NodeContext: Not convinced. He doesn't want to leave the prisoner behind.

MoveOut_AD_1.speaker: Torturer Spike
MoveOut_AD_1.text: Oh, forget about 'im. There'll be more of them soon.
MoveOut_AD_1.context: NodeContext: he doesn't have patience to deal with the other goblin. He wants his reward/drink.
